title: Justin Bieber may have just reignited his feud with Taylor Swift after mocking her post-surgery meltdown
text:
Justin Bieber may have just reignited his feud with Taylor Swift after mocking her post-surgery meltdown

Cape Town – You would’ve seen Taylor Swift’s post-surgery meltdown over a banana by now. You may not have seen Justin Bieber’s version of the viral video, though.

On Monday, the video shot by Hailey Bieber and posted to her Instagram stories went viral. And although it’s no longer on her profile, Swifties found the video – and called the Biebers out.

SEE THE VIDEO HERE:

?? | Justin Bieber mocks Taylor’s Jimmy Fallon interview clip of Taylor after Lasik Surgery via Instagram Live pic.twitter.com/oPPAsMvQk1 — Taylor Swift Updates (Backup) (@TSUpdatesNYBU2) October 7, 2019

Hailey quickly tweeted an apology directed at one of Taylor’s fans, angered by the model’s video.

"I never knew I could make somebody so upset... truly I’m so sorry you’re THIS upset?! Lord have mercy I hope I’m never this upset about someone I don’t know!![sic]"

"listen. I think it’s awesome how passionate you are and how hard you ride for someone you’re a fan of, it’s beautiful how dedicated you are. If there’s something I did to personally hurt you or offend you I’m sorry, it’s not my intention to upset you by any means[sic]," she wrote.

"but being angry at someone you don’t know does nothing for you. I know cause I been there.. all it’s gonna do is make you miserable. Don’t let ME of all people get you feeling that way. Trust me, I’m not worth the energy, nobody should be worth that energy![sic]"

Hailey has since removed her tweets, but fans are still quite upset.

"He’s a bully," commented one user, another said, "Imagine how tired we are."

The comments could have much to do with the fact that this isn’t the first time Justin’s mocked Taylor.

When Taylor publicly revealed Scooter Braun owns the right to six of her records, after Justin’s unwavering support for his friend and manager, she also attached a screenshot of the Sorry singer’s 2016 Instagram post which showed him FaceTiming Scooter Braun and Kanye West. The captioned on the post that has since been deleted read, "Taylor Swift what up," reports E! News.

According to Just Jared, Justin apologised to Taylor shortly after, calling his post "hurtful" and "distasteful", though it seems his latest video may have just reignited their feud.
description: Swifties are feuding with the Biebers over this viral video.
